definition_en: A specific office within the NRC that provides independent expertise and technical bases for regulatory decisions and identifies safety issues.
definition_ko: 규제 결정을 위한 독립적인 전문 지식과 기술적 토대를 제공하고 안전 문제를 식별하는 NRC 산하 부서.

slots.context_ko: U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission Office of Nuclear Regulatory Research Washington, DC 20555-0001
